sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PlatformEncryptedFields</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Available fields based on encryption configurations states and user session.</description>
        <name>PlatformEncryptedFields</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PlatformEncryptedFields = Class.create();
PlatformEncryptedFields.prototype = {

	process: function(dependent_value) {
		var columnData = new SNC.MassEncryptionJob().getSupportedFieldChoicesForTable(dependent_value);
		var columnJson = JSON.parse(columnData);
		var choiceList = new GlideChoiceList();
		for (var columnValue in columnJson)
			choiceList.add(columnValue, columnJson[columnValue]);

		return choiceList;
	},

    type: 'PlatformEncryptedFields'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-25 03:19:02</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>11f2ef1a77000010bef6d0adda1061fd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PlatformEncryptedFields</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Encryption Core" source="com.glide.encryption.core">2f854d4b6de620100acb70b3534330ed</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_11f2ef1a77000010bef6d0adda1061fd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-10-01 07:36:42</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>466</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
